data.name: Traffic Chase Demo
data.detailed_description:
Feel the fun of the road race!


This is a short demo of the gameplay, limited by one race and one road.

Your goal is to overtake all other drivers started with you and those you have connected to race.
The game is over when you either too far behind the last driver or too far in front of the other racers.

Please see game options (via Esc key) to change key or joystick/wheel mappings, audio settings, visual effects for your needs.

Default controls are:
  • WSAD, Space - control the car
  • H - horn other traffic drivers to connect to race
  • P - pause
  • Esc - menu
  • C - change view
  • Mouse move - free look
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Traffic racing game. Drive on roads, ask other drivers to race with you. Make a crazy races with other traffic drivers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD analogue
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660, Radeon Graphics Vega 7
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Present
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 / AMD analogue
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1660, RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Present
  • Additional Notes: Steering wheel or XBox360 controller
